buttonman.name: Gobling
buttonman.bio: Gobling is all about the bling-bling. He likes pets, brushing his teeth, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Orky
buttonman.bio: Orky is best know for a minor role in a recent hobbit-porn film. He likes gnashing of teeth, rock climbing, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Evilor
buttonman.bio: Evilor was good, but now he isn't. He likes treachary, betrayal, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Vampy
buttonman.bio: Vampy is a bloodsucking fiend. He likes blood, sucking, playing FFT:Advance, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Sluggo
buttonman.bio: Slugo strong. Sluggo smack people. Sluggo like beat people up.

buttonman.name: Dargon
buttonman.bio: Dargon is a powerful dragon. He like jazz flute, pizza, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Ratty
buttonman.bio: Ratty is a rat. He likes old food, bubonic plague, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Captian Shabb
buttonman.bio: Cpt. Shabb misses the briney sea, and takes out his frustration on whomever happens by. He likes boats, sailing, sea creatures, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Slug
buttonman.bio: Slug is a large invertabrate. He lacks higher brain functions, yet still likes beating people up.

buttonman.name: Panda
buttonman.bio: Panda is, well, a giant panda. He likes eucalyptus shoots, spring rainfall, and beating people up.
